data.content:
Danh từ
(như) cookie
chị nấu ăn, chị cấp dưỡng, chị nuôi

noun
plural -ies
[count] chiefly US :a sweet baked food that is usually small, flat, and round and is made from flour and sugar
This recipe makes about two dozen cookies.
She put a batch of cookies into the oven.
chocolate chip cookies - often used before another noun
a cookie jar
cookie dough
informal :person
Don't worry about hershe's a tough cookie.
You are one smart cookie.
computers :a file that may be added to your computer when you visit a Web site and that contains information about you (such as an identification code or a record of the Web pages you have visited)
that's the way the cookie crumbles
informal - used when something bad has happened to say that you must accept things the way they are
I'm disappointed that I didn't get the job but that's the way the cookie crumbles. [=that's how it goes]
